item.title: Want to disinfect your iPhone? Go to a McDonald's restroom
item.description: You've never seen anything like this. Well, I certainly haven't.

item.title: Southwest Airlines just made a twisted admission that'll infuriate customers
item.description: It didn't have to be this way, but everyone booking for the holidays had better beware.

item.title: Best headphone Black Friday deals 2022: Lowest prices on AirPods Pro, Bose, Galaxy Buds, and more
item.description: Everyone deserves a new pair of headphones for the holidays -- especially if they're at half the price.

item.title: Best HP Black Friday 2022 deals: Up to $500 off select PCs, monitors, and accessories
item.description: HP is best known as one of the biggest PC makers out there, but the company also produces great monitors, printers, and accessories. Let's take a look at what deals are available for its products leading up to this year's Black Friday extravaganza.

item.title: Best early Apple Black Friday deals 2022: Savings on AirPods Max, MacBook Air, and more starting today
item.description: If someone on your holiday shopping list already owns an Apple device, they will likely be ecstatic to find another Apple product they can add to their ecosystem under the tree. If you want to buy an Apple product without breaking the bank, here are some great deals.

item.title: Best early Black Friday monitor deals 2022: Save big on 4K displays, gaming and smart monitors, and more
item.description: Your monitor is the main point of communication between you and your PC, so it's of the utmost importance that you're using a good quality display with a size and spec sheet that suits your needs, regardless of whether your a straightlaced office worker or a hardcore gamer.

item.title: Black Friday Samsung deals: $300 off Galaxy S22 Ultra, $2,500 off 85-inch TV
item.description: Calling all Samsung fans! Let this early Black Friday deals hub serve as your home ground for the latest and best savings on Samsung Galaxy smartphones, wearables, TVs, appliances, and more.

item.title: Best early Target Black Friday deals 2022: $80 off AirPods Pro, $50 off Echo
item.description: These are the best deals Target has to offer ahead of Black Friday. Make sure to check back later, as we'll be updating the list in the days leading up to Black Friday.

item.title: Best early AirPods Black Friday deals 2022: $80 off AirPods, $100 off AirPods Max
item.description: AirPods are bound to be on everyone's wishlist. The buds that barely go on sale are about to spread holiday cheer through both their crystal clear sound quality and amazing prices.

item.title: Best early Black Friday smartphone deals: Save hundreds on flagship devices
item.description: If you held off on upgrading your smartphone until the holiday shopping season, your patience is finally being rewarded. These are the best early Black Friday deals that will save you hundreds on prime-time handsets.

item.title: Best early Apple Watch Black Friday deals 2022: $90 off Apple Watch Series 8, $100 off Series 7
item.description: Black Friday isn't until the end of November but some great deals on the Apple Watch have already landed.

item.title: Best early Walmart Black Friday deals 2022: $600 off LG TV, $200 off Acer Chromebook
item.description: Black Friday is a few weeks away, but Walmart has already started launching great tech deals. You can save big on the best tech gifts this holiday season.

item.title: Best early Black Friday 2022 deals under $30
item.description: These tech gifts are all $30 or less ahead of the Black Friday sales event and are perfect for anyone on your list this holiday season.

item.title: The top 3 pickleball states -- yes, it's a thing
item.description: Everyone's doing it. Are your neighbors secretly Googling pickleball?

item.title: Best early Black Friday robot vacuum deals 2022: Save up to $500 on Roomba s9+
item.description: You can save hundreds on a robot vacuum with these deals, and keep checking back because we'll be adding more deals as we get closer to Black Friday.

item.title: Best early Black Friday laptop deals 2022: Up to $700 off Dell XPS 15, $200 off MacBook Pro
item.description: ZDNET has rounded up its top picks for early laptop deals ahead of Black Friday, from retailers and manufacturers.

item.title: Coros Apex 2 Pro review: Cheaper sports watches are getting good
item.description: The Coros Apex 2 Pro is the latest version of the midrange GPS sports watch, with several design and feature improvements that make it a killer deal for less than $500.

item.title: How to watch the last total lunar eclipse until 2025
item.description: On Monday, you will have the last opportunity to see a 'Blood Moon' for the next three years. Here is what you need to know to watch.

item.title: TikTok is up and running after a brief outage
item.description: If you were having problems with TikTok, don't worry - the app seems to be back up and running.

item.title: Best early Amazon Black Friday deals 2022: Save big on Echo Show, Fire TV, Chromebooks, and more
item.description: Amazon's Black Friday plan involves getting the deals straight to you earlier this year. Shop its deals and score big savings on top tech items and gifts.
